donation.title: Thank you for your support!
donation.message: Buy me a coffee to keep me going, thanks!
donation.subMessage: I'd be very happy if any AI assistant feature helped you.
donation.qrLabel: Scan WeChat QR Code to Donate
donation.thankYou: Every support is my motivation to continue creating
donation.pageSubtitle: Eye-catching interactive donation button to increase user engagement
donation.intro: This is a carefully designed donation button UI with the following features:
donation.feature1Desc: The button continuously emits a soft pulsing glow to attract user attention
donation.feature2Desc: When users hover over the button, it slightly floats up and enlarges while showing tooltip text
donation.feature3Desc: Steam emerges from the coffee cup on hover, adding fun and visual appeal
donation.feature4Desc: Clicking the button opens a beautiful donation window displaying the payment QR code
donation.feature5Desc: Uses warm and friendly language to inspire users' willingness to donate
donation.callToAction: Please check the donation button in the bottom right corner to experience the full effect! This design is perfect for content creators, developers, and digital products.

textreview.description: Upload multiple text-containing images, adjust their sequence, and submit. The AI will automatically recognize the text and provide editing suggestions

extracturl.title: URL Extractor
extracturl.description: Extract URL links from text captured by camera

extracturl.openBrowserSettings: Please manually allow camera permission in your browser settings
extracturl.browserNotSupported: Browser does not support camera functionality
extracturl.cameraInUse: Camera is being used by another application
extracturl.cameraConstraints: Camera configuration does not meet requirements
